title: How do I link my #UNOready@GCash to the UNO Mobile app?
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)

To get started, download the UNO Mobile App on your mobile device.

1. On the UNO Mobile app, select **Link GSave Account**
2. Enter your mobile number, and then wait for your OTP (One-Time PIN)
3. Input your OTP and take a selfie
4. Set your password

Once youâ€™ve set your password, you can proceed to log in to your UNO Mobile App account.
